item.description:
If you RSVP yes please show up so I don't have to deny someone this meet up who really wanted to go.

Yes we're doing a Mix N Mingle formerly known as Grab A Date. Non meet up people are always welcome and encouraged only for this event they should be single as well (see above definition of single)! Guys are highly encouraged to join us!

I have personally reserved the upstairs in Globe Bar and Cafe The fun starts at 6:30 and goes until the place closes. We will start off all together upstairs with our drinks but as the night goes on Im sure we'll be all over the place so come some what on time if you want to find us.

This place is very T accessible! I was told to jump on the Green line and ride to Copley and they're a short walk from that stop and again Globe Bar and Cafe' is located at 565 Boylston St.
( between Dartmouth and Clarendon ) at Copley Square, across from Trinity church.

This will be done as a joint event with our friends in New England 25+ Social Fun so if you happen to be part of both groups please do NOT double RSVP.

If you RSVP yes please show up so I don't have to deny someone this meet up who really wanted to go.

Questions? Ask away otherwise I will see you April 12th
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be upstairs in the beginning :) I look like my pic so do say hi if you find me else where :)
item.why: We're a fun bunch of people who just want to relax after a long week and meet some new singles
item.name: Mix N Mingle
